params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.pods
params.description: Kubernetes Pods associated with the finding. This field will contain Pod records for each container that is owned by a Pod.

params.name: data.node_pools
params.description: GKE Node Pools associated with the finding. This field will contain NodePool information for each Node, when it is available.

params.name: data.roles
params.description: Provides Kubernetes role information for findings that involve Roles or ClusterRoles.

params.name: data.bindings
params.description: Provides Kubernetes role binding information for findings that involve RoleBindings or ClusterRoleBindings.

params.name: data.access_reviews
params.description: Provides information on any Kubernetes access reviews (i.e. privilege checks) relevant to the finding.
